thread.title: BRIEF-Adesto Technologies Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.01

title: BRIEF-Adesto Technologies Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.01
text: February 13, 2018 / 9:29 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Adesto Technologies Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.01 Reuters Staff Feb 13 (Reuters) - Adesto Technologies Corp: * ADESTO TECHNOLOGIES REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.03 * Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.01 * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $14.7 MILLION TO $15 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE UP 31.3 PERCENT * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 31 PERCENT TO $16.2 MILLION * SEES ‍Q1 GAAP OPERATING EXPENSES TO RANGE BETWEEN $8.5 MILLION AND $8.7 MILLION​ * ‍GROSS MARGIN IS EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN 46% AND 49% FOR Q1 OF 2018​ * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.02, REVENUE VIEW $16.0 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q1 REVENUE VIEW $15.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
